SUP.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Battle Moves/Traits: SUP.
By Trickster on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 04:27 pm:

TraitDescriptionAnima Cost
Power PushThe Shove Gauge increases with ease.1000
ForceWhen life goes under 10% Guts is regained faster.1500
LeadershipIncreases everyone's accuracy in continuous attack.2500
TeamworkWhen you use continuous attacks this decreases Guts used in Skills performed by everyone.2500
MoraleYou will be able to begin battles with a somewhat large amount of Guts.1500
Fighting AuraAn up-grade of Morale. You will be able to begin battles with a somewhat large amount of Guts.2500
Final GutsThis will allow you to regenerate one time after downing in battle.1500
High SpeedThis increases a monster's speed.1000
LivelyWhen a monster is no longer able to fight use this to suppress its Injury.500
EnergeticAn up-grade of Lively. When a monster is no longer able to fight this will greatly lower a monster's injury.1000
